name: Serious Rent Arrears
short_description: At least 2 months' (or 8 weeks') rent unpaid at notice and hearing

requirements.threshold: 2 months' rent (monthly) or 8 weeks' rent (weekly) at notice and at hearing
requirements.continuous: Arrears must still meet threshold at the hearing

evidence_required: Proof arrears meet threshold at notice date
Proof arrears meet threshold at hearing date

high_probability: Clear rent schedule with persistent arrears
Arrears exceed threshold by significant margin
risks: Arrears fall below threshold before hearing
Dispute over rent calculation or housing benefit timing
